cz.ive.manager
Class QTUpdate

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.messaging.SyncHook
      cz.ive.manager.QueryTrigger
          cz.ive.manager.QTUpdate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Hook, Listener, java.io.Serializable
public class QTUpdate
extends QueryTrigger
implements Listener

Box of passive update. Stores copy of the IveObject and notify listeners about its changes.

Author:
Jirka
See Also:

Field Detail

copy

private IveObject copy
copy of updated object is stored here

original

private IveObject original
valid object according to is object actualized

valid

private boolean valid
Signify whether object is visible by given sensors. If not, no changes in object are visible and actualization continues after it become again visible.

aplicableSensors

private java.util.List<Sensor> aplicableSensors
sensors aplicable regarding to actual object position

QTUpdate

public QTUpdate(ManagerOfSenses man,
                java.util.List<Sensor> sens,
                IveObject obj,
                IveObject orig)
Creates new trigger to manage passive updates.

Parameters:
man - refernece to manager of wits
sens - list of sensors
obj - copy of object to update
orig - valid object according to is actualized
Method Detail

setOriginalObject

public boolean setOriginalObject(IveObject object)
Sets the original object. Can be called only once (with non-null object) on one instance.

Parameters:
object - Source of the updated copy
Returns:
true if the original was set, false if this is not a first call

isValid

public boolean isValid()
Signify whether object is visible by given sensors. If not, no changes in object are visible and actualization continues after it become again visible.

Returns:
true if object is valid

getCopy

public IveObject getCopy()
Returns:
actualized copy

sensorMove

void sensorMove(Sensor sens)
Called by Manager of senses when sensor relevant to this query change its position so the set of covered waypoitns has changed.

Parameters:
sens - sensor which has moved

changeSensors

public void changeSensors(java.util.List<Sensor> sens)
Description copied from class: QueryTrigger
Replaces set of sensors for new one and process actualization - allways calls notification.

Overrides:
changeSensors in class QueryTrigger
Parameters:
sens - new list of sensors

changed

public void changed(Hook initiator)
Signalization that original object has changed. Update copy (change in one attribute, if possible, or update whole object) and notify listeners.

Specified by:
changed in interface Listener
Parameters:
initiator - object that was changed - could be AttributeValue or whole IveObject - algorithm depends on it

moveObject

void moveObject(WayPoint newPos)
Called when object moves to new position. Re-count the set of applicable sensors and updates copy according to possible changes or makes object ivalid if it's not visible by any sensor.

Parameters:
newPos - new position where object moves

makeInvalid

void makeInvalid()
Called when object is removed from Manager of Senses or when it moves outside from the range of all applicable sensors.

canceled

public void canceled(Hook initiator)
This method is used when deleting this object to unregister from all registered hooks.

Specified by:
canceled in interface Listener
Parameters:
initiator - Initiator of the cancellation. Only if "this" is passed, there will be an effect.
